entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Stewart
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:35 AM PST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, 0.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Stewart Airport 2:00 PM PST Monday 23 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: 0.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 0.2°C
Wind: ENE 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A
